channel.title: attack.impact on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.impact on My New Hugo Site

item.title: An Application Is Uninstall
item.description: An application have been remove check if it is a critical

item.title: Run from a Zip File
item.description: Payloads may be compressed, archived, or encrypted in order to avoid detection

item.title: Delete Volume Shadow Copies via WMI with PowerShell
item.description: Deletes Windows Volume Shadow Copies with PowerShell code and Get-WMIObject. This technique is used by numerous ransomware families such as Sodinokibi/REvil

item.title: Disable Important Scheduled Task
item.description: Adversaries may stop services or processes in order to conduct Data Destruction or Data Encrypted for Impact on the data stores of services like Exchange and SQL Server.

item.title: Overwrite Deleted Data with Cipher
item.description: Adversaries may destroy data and files on specific systems or in large numbers on a network to interrupt availability to systems, services, and network resources. Data destruction is likely to render stored data irrecoverable by forensic techniques through overwriting files or data on local and remote drives

item.title: Remove Account From Domain Admin Group
item.description: Adversaries may interrupt availability of system and network resources by inhibiting access to accounts utilized by legitimate users. Accounts may be deleted, locked, or manipulated (ex: changed credentials) to remove access to accounts.

item.title: Replace Desktop Wallpaper by Powershell
item.description: An adversary may deface systems internal to an organization in an attempt to intimidate or mislead users. This may take the form of modifications to internal websites, or directly to user systems with the replacement of the desktop wallpaper

item.title: Suspicious Creation TXT File in User Desktop
item.description: Ransomware create txt file in the user Desktop

item.title: Suspicious Execution of Taskkill
item.description: Adversaries may stop services or processes in order to conduct Data Destruction or Data Encrypted for Impact on the data stores of services like Exchange and SQL Server.

item.title: Suspicious Reg Add BitLocker
item.description: Suspicious add key for BitLocker

item.title: Windows Crypto Mining Indicators
item.description: Detects command line parameters or strings often used by crypto miners

item.title: Windows Crypto Mining Pool Connections
item.description: Detects process connections to a Monero crypto mining pool

item.title: Monero Crypto Coin Mining Pool Lookup
item.description: Detects suspicious DNS queries to Monero mining pools

item.title: Google Cloud SQL Database Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detect when a Cloud SQL DB has been modified or deleted.

item.title: Clipboard Collection with Xclip Tool
item.description: Detects attempts to collect data stored in the clipboard from users with the usage of xclip tool. Xclip has to be installed. Highly recommended using rule on servers, due to high usage of clipboard utilities on user workstations.

item.title: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog
item.description: Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog.

item.title: DD File Overwrite
item.description: Detects potential overwriting and deletion of a file using DD.

item.title: Conti Ransomware Execution
item.description: Conti ransomware command line ioc

item.title: OneLogin User Account Locked
item.description: Detects when an user acount is locked or suspended.

item.title: OneLogin User Assumed Another User
item.description: Detects when an user assumed another user account.

item.title: Suspicious MacOS Firmware Activity
item.description: Detects when a user manipulates with Firmward Password on MacOS. NOTE - this command has been disabled on silicon-based apple computers.

item.title: Commands to Clear or Remove the Syslog
item.description: Detects specific commands commonly used to remove or empty the syslog

item.title: Okta Admin Role Assigned to an User or Group
item.description: Detects when an the Administrator role is assigned to an user or group.

item.title: Okta Unauthorized Access to App
item.description: Detects when unauthorized access to app occurs.

item.title: Okta User Account Locked Out
item.description: Detects when an user account is locked out.

item.title: Okta Network Zone Deactivated or Deleted
item.description: Detects when an Network Zone is Deactivated or Deleted.

item.title: Okta API Token Revoked
item.description: Detects when a API Token is revoked.

item.title: Okta Application Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when an application is modified or deleted.

item.title: Okta Application Sign-On Policy Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when an application Sign-on Policy is modified or deleted.

item.title: Okta Policy Rule Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when an Policy Rule is Modified or Deleted.

item.title: Okta Policy Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when an Okta policy is modified or deleted.

item.title: Google Workspace Application Removed
item.description: Detects when an an application is removed from Google Workspace.

item.title: Google Workspace MFA Disabled
item.description: Detects when multi-factor authentication (MFA) is disabled.

item.title: Google Workspace Role Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when an a role is modified or deleted in Google Workspace.

item.title: Google Workspace Role Privilege Deleted
item.description: Detects when an a role privilege is deleted in Google Workspace.

item.title: Azure Suppression Rule Created
item.description: Identifies when a suppression rule is created in Azure. Adversary’s could attempt this to evade detection.

item.title: Azure Keyvault Secrets Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when secrets are modified or deleted in Azure.

item.title: Azure Keyvault Key Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a Keyvault Key is modified or deleted in Azure.

item.title: Azure Key Vault Modified or Deleted.
item.description: Identifies when a key vault is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Application Security Group Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a application security group is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Application Gateway Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a application gateway is modified or deleted.

item.title: AWS EKS Cluster Created or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when an EKS cluster is created or deleted.

item.title: Conti Volume Shadow Listing
item.description: Detects a command used by conti to access volume shadow backups

item.title: Conti Volume Shadow Listing
item.description: Detects a command used by conti to access volume shadow backups

item.title: Google Cloud VPN Tunnel Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a VPN Tunnel Modified or Deleted in Google Cloud.

item.title: Google Cloud DNS Zone Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a DNS Zone is modified or deleted in Google Cloud.

item.title: Google Cloud Re-identifies Sensitive Information.
item.description: Identifies when sensitive information is re-identified in google Cloud.

item.title: AWS EFS Fileshare Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when a EFS Fileshare is modified or deleted. You can’t delete a file system that is in use. If the file system has any mount targets, the adversary must first delete them, so deletion of a mount will occur before deletion of a fileshare.

item.title: AWS EFS Fileshare Mount Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when a EFS Fileshare Mount is modified or deleted. An adversary breaking any file system using the mount target that is being deleted, which might disrupt instances or applications using those mounts.

item.title: Google Cloud Service Account Disabled or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a service account is disabled or deleted in Google Cloud.

item.title: Google Cloud Service Account Modified
item.description: Identifies when a service account is modified in Google Cloud.

item.title: Google Cloud Storage Buckets Modified or Deleted
item.description: Detects when storage bucket is modified or deleted in Google Cloud.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Pods Deleted
item.description: Identifies the deletion of Azure Kubernetes Pods.

item.title: AWS ElastiCache Security Group Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when an ElastiCache security group has been modified or deleted.

item.title: AWS EC2 Disable EBS Encryption
item.description: Identifies disabling of default Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) encryption in the current region. Disabling default encryption does not change the encryption status of your existing volumes.

item.title: Maze Ransomware
item.description: Detects specific process characteristics of Maze ransomware word document droppers

item.title: Audit CVE Event
item.description: Detects events generated by Windows to indicate the exploitation of a known vulnerability (e.g. CVE-2020-0601)

item.title: Silence.EDA Detection
item.description: Detects Silence empireDNSagent

item.title: Cisco Denial of Service
item.description: Detect a system being shutdown or put into different boot mode

item.title: Cisco File Deletion
item.description: See what files are being deleted from flash file systems

item.title: Cisco Modify Configuration
item.description: Modifications to a config that will serve an adversary’s impacts or persistence

item.title: DTRACK Process Creation
item.description: Detects specific process parameters as seen in DTRACK infections

item.title: Overwriting the File with Dev Zero or Null
item.description: Detects overwriting (effectively wiping/deleting) of a file.

item.title: Stop Windows Service
item.description: Detects a windows service to be stopped

item.title: Secure Deletion with SDelete
item.description: Detects renaming of file while deletion with SDelete tool.

item.title: Suspicious Log Entries
item.description: Detects suspicious log entries in Linux log files

item.title: Multiple Modsecurity Blocks
item.description: Detects multiple blocks by the mod_security module (Web Application Firewall)

item.title: Apache Segmentation Fault
item.description: Detects a segmentation fault error message caused by a creashing apache worker process

item.title: Activity Performed by Terminated User
item.description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported for users whose account were terminated in Azure AD, but still perform activities in other platforms such as AWS or Salesforce. This is especially relevant for users who use another account to manage resources, since these accounts are often not terminated when a user leaves the company.

item.title: Azure Application Credential Modified
item.description: Identifies when a application credential is modified.

item.title: Azure Container Registry Created or Deleted
item.description: Detects when a Container Registry is created or deleted.

item.title: Azure Device No Longer Managed or Compliant
item.description: Identifies when a device in azure is no longer managed or compliant

item.title: Azure Device or Configuration Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a device or device configuration in azure is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure DNS Zone Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when DNS zone is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Firewall Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a firewall is created, modified, or deleted.

item.title: Azure Firewall Rule Collection Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when Rule Collections (Application, NAT, and Network) is being modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Firewall Rule Configuration Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a Firewall Rule Configuration is Modified or Deleted.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Cluster Created or Deleted
item.description: Detects when a Azure Kubernetes Cluster is created or deleted.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Network Policy Change
item.description: Identifies when a Azure Kubernetes network policy is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes RoleBinding/ClusterRoleBinding Modified and Deleted
item.description: Detects the creation or patching of potential malicious RoleBinding/ClusterRoleBinding.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Secret or Config Object Access
item.description: Identifies when a Kubernetes account access a sensitive objects such as configmaps or secrets.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Sensitive Role Access
item.description: Identifies when ClusterRoles/Roles are being modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Service Account Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a service account is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Network Firewall Policy Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a Firewall Policy is Modified or Deleted.

item.title: Azure Network Security Configuration Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a network security configuration is modified or deleted.

item.title: Azure Point-to-site VPN Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a Point-to-site VPN is Modified or Deleted.

item.title: Azure Virtual Network Device Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a virtual network device is being modified or deleted. This can be a network interface, network virtual appliance, virtual hub, or virtual router.

item.title: Azure Virtual Network Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a Virtual Network is modified or deleted in Azure.

item.title: Azure VPN Connection Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a VPN connection is modified or deleted.

item.title: Delete Volume Shadow Copies Via WMI With PowerShell
item.description: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities via PowerShell

item.title: Deletes Backup Files
item.description: Adversaries may delete or remove built-in operating system data and turn off services designed to aid in the recovery of a corrupted system to prevent recovery.

item.title: Image Load of VSS_PS.dll by Uncommon Executable
item.description: Detects the image load of vss_ps.dll by uncommon executables using OriginalFileName datapoint

item.title: LockerGoga Ransomware
item.description: Detects LockerGoga Ransomware command line.

item.title: Microsoft 365 - Potential Ransomware Activity
item.description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user uploads files to the cloud that might be infected with ransomware.

item.title: Microsoft 365 - Unusual Volume of File Deletion
item.description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported a user has deleted a unusual a large volume of files.

item.title: Nginx Core Dump
item.description: Detects a core dump of a crashing Nginx worker process, which could be a signal of a serious problem or exploitation attempts.

item.title: NTFS Vulnerability Exploitation
item.description: This the exploitation of a NTFS vulnerability as reported without many details via Twitter

item.title: Shadow Copies Deletion Using Operating Systems Utilities
item.description: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities

item.title: Suspicious Execution of Shutdown
item.description: Use of the commandline to shutdown or reboot windows

item.title: Suspicious Multiple File Rename Or Delete Occurred
item.description: Detects multiple file rename or delete events occurrence within a specified period of time by a same user (these events may signalize about ransomware activity).

item.title: Sysinternals SDelete Delete File
item.description: Use of SDelete to erase a file not the free space

item.title: System Shutdown/Reboot
item.description: Adversaries may shutdown/reboot systems to interrupt access to, or aid in the destruction of, those systems.

item.title: System Shutdown/Reboot
item.description: Adversaries may shutdown/reboot systems to interrupt access to, or aid in the destruction of, those systems.

item.title: Windows Update Error
item.description: Windows Update get some error Check if need a 0-days KB
